message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $22,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's the highest I can go.
Bob, I appreciate you countering. While I'm motivated to sell, I can't go as low as $18,000. Would you consider $20,000? It's a fairer offer considering the product's value.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $19,000. I'm trying to stay within my budget, but I really think this product would be a great addition to my collection.
